|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;F59L1G81LA-25T; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16DP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = AC:9E:17 |oui = AC:9E:17

|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, internal,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = yes,, 5-pin header,, unpopulated,,

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/29/2015 |estreldate = 10/22/2015 |estprice = 280 |upc = 889349052150 |ean = 0889349052150 |newegg = N82E16833320245 |asin = B01707HPKS |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 1000 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RT-AC3100 REV 4.07" and "1519" is silkscreened on the main board.
DFS certification and VHT80+80 support were added with a C2PC request on 3/6/2019. Actual support would probably need to come from a firmware update. The first page of the DFS Test Report lists two manufacturers: [[Askey]] and [[Compal]].
*Differences between the three models covered by this FCC certification are described in the DFS Test Report as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! style="text-align:left;"| Model No. ! LAN Port ! Heat sink color |- |[[ASUS RT-AC88U|RT-AC88U]] |8 LAN ports |Silver, Red |- |'''RT-AC3100''' |4 LAN ports |Silver, Black |- |[[ASUS RT-AC88R|RT-AC88R]] |8 LAN ports |Silver, Red |}
* Web GUI: http://router.asus.com {{see also|ASUS RT-AC88U|Arcadyan}} {{FCC ST|11/22/2015}}
==Links of Interest== <!-- ===News=== *[http://www.cnet.com/products/asus-rt-ac88u-router/ ''Asus unveils the RT-AC88U, its first 8-port MU-MIMO Wi-Fi router'' on '''C|Net'''] *[http://www.techhive.com/article/2991380/home-networking/asus-gamer-centric-rt-ac88u-packs-more-ethernet-ports-than-any-other-80211ac-router.html ''Asus RT-AC88U packs more ethernet ports 802.11ac router'' on '''Techhive'''] *[http://www.pcper.com/news/Networking/ASUS-RT-AC88U-MU-MIMO-Router-8-Port-Switch ''ASUS RT-AC88U MU-MIMO Router with 8-Port Switch'' on '''PCper'''] (Spec.) -->

===Flashing Tomato=== Please insert instructions here
==Notes== ===Features=== <small> *Ultra-fast 802.11ac Wi-Fi router with a combined dual-band data rate of 3167 Mbps :for low latency online gaming, smooth 4K streaming and extremely fast file-sharing *Broadcom acqam technology boosts 5 GHz data rates :up to 2167 Mbps and 2.4 GHz up to 1000 Mbps *4x4 antenna design with AiRadar universal beamforming for wireless :signal coverage exceeding 465m² (around 5000 square feet) *1.4 GHz dual-core processor improves USB and WAN/LAN speed *Link aggregation supports close to 2 Gbps wired transmission :for more devices to enjoy faster access speed *Up to 4X capacity Wi-Fi with revolutionary MU-MIMO technology *AiProtection for total security and privacy *Parental Controls let you manage your family’s web activity :and ensure a safe environment for younger users </small> ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM47094 BCM47094] @1.4 GHz (''ARM Cortex A9'') *Flash: 128 MB (NAND), RAM: 512 MB (DDR3) *Wi-Fi: 4x4 MU-MIMO, acqam, Dual Band, 2.4/5 GHz *WLAN: 2x [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] SoC 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac *PA: 4x ''[[Skyworks]]'' SE2623L (2.4 GHz), 4x ''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY85405 (5 GHz) *Antenna: 4x Detachable Dual Band 5dBi antennas *Switch: int. [[Broadcom]] BCM47094 *Ports: 1x WAN (GbE), 4x LAN (GbE) *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 *Applications: ASUSWRT, AiCloud, AiProtection, DLNA server, :VPN server, Download Master, Guest Network, High-Power mode, :Static IP, Automatic IP, PPPoE (MPPE support), PPTP, L2TP, IPv4, IPv6
[[Category:English Documentation]]
